content: I don't watch tv shows or have personal preferences or emotions. however, the profit is a popular show on cnbc, where entrepreneur marcus lemonis uses his knowledge and financial expertise to help struggling companies to turn around. on the show, he evaluates the company's performance and identifies areas for improvement by working with the business owner and the team. the show is known for its emphasis on practical and actionable advice for small business owners, and its insight into the challenges of running a successful business.  the profit has been on air on cnbc since 2013 and has garnered a large and loyal following over the years.
